Mere Blog Theme test

This is the demo site for the Mere Blog Theme

Mere Blog Theme

AAA Mere is a minimal and simple blog theme, and nothing more, for use with Jekyll and GitHub Pages.

This is the homepage, it has some space at the top to display your introduction text and then it displays the latest 6 posts below.

seven Post with Intro

Published Oct 1, 2020 by Guest Author

Version 0.3 allows you to provide a intro and an intro image. When creating your post add a short intro text an intro_image as a path to an image and then specify the intro_image_ratio which should...
